messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Hi I'm new
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/3/03 5:05:24 PM, bcniece@juno.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/3/03 5:05:24 PM, bcniece@... writes:

<< looks like I joined at just the right time...as far
as doeable how about Denzel Washington?? >>

First, Christine, there are discussions in the discussion area at
www.unschooling.com about convincing husbands, and there might be something there that
would help.

And Denzel Washington, in Crimson Tide, is WONDERFUL. And his best buddy in
the story is played by Viggo Mortensen (lately more famous as Aragorn), who
plays his whole part doing nothing more physical than ironing his uniform. Very
still acting. Much eye flash and face twitch, and for those who like
military cleanface and short hair better than long hair and beard (which always
baffles ME, but hey, I like Robin Williams for having hair EVERYWHERE and for being
brilliant secondarily <g>), then that's a good Viggo role. He's usually
hairier.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Hi I'm new
messages.messageBody:
From: <bcniece@...>

<<Hi - I'm new to this group...I have eight children..I have been an
"unschooler" all of their lives <grin> but alas hubby does not feel the
> same and sometimes this can cause some VERY loud discussions...so far I'm
winning <big grin>..looks like I joined at just the right time...as far
as doeable how about Denzel Washington?? Christine>>


Welcome Christine and what a nice number of children!!! As far as Denzel, I
already got him mentioned posts ago!!!!! He's actually at the top of my
list. <BEG>


Mary B

messages.subject: Re: Hi I'm new
messages.msgSnippet: Hi - I m new to this group...I have eight children..I have been an unschooler all of their lives  but alas hubby does not feel the same and sometimes
messages.messageBody:
Hi - I'm new to this group...I have eight children..I have been an
"unschooler" all of their lives <grin> but alas hubby does not feel the
same and sometimes this can cause some VERY loud discussions...so far I'm
winning <big grin>..looks like I joined at just the right time...as far
as doeable how about Denzel Washington?? Christine
